title: Incredible Hulk Miniseries
description:
The Hulk is a fictional character that appears in comic books published by Marvel Comics. The character first appeared in The Incredible Hulk #1 (May 1962), and was created by Stan Lee and Jack Kirby. After physicist Dr. Robert Bruce Banner was caught in the blast of a gamma bomb he created, he was transformed into the Hulk, a giant, raging monster. The character, both as Banner and the Hulk, is frequently pursued by the police or the armed forces, often as a result of the destruction he causes. While the coloration of the character&#039;s skin varies during the course of its publication history, the Hulk is most often depicted as green. Hulk is one of Marvel Comics&#039; most recognized characters.

I am posting some Incredible Hulk miniseries from my personal collection which I have collected from various sources.It seems that recenlty I have posted a lot of minis.  The minis include 

1. Hulk Smash
2. Marvel Age-Hulk
3. Startling Stories-Banner
4. Gamma Games
5. Hulk Gray
6. Nightmerica
7. Unchained
8. Hulk & The Thing - Hard Knocks
9. Hulk & Wolverine
10.Hulk & Wolverine - Six Hours
11.The Rampaging Hulk
12.The Rampaging Hulk Magazine
13.Ultimate Wolverine Vs. Hulk

Enjoy and Seed.
